commit.message:
Rollup merge of #57049 - cramertj:repr-packed, r=Centril

Stabilize #[repr(packed(N))]

Fixes https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/33158

Rollup merge of #57049 - cramertj:repr-packed, r=Centril

Stabilize #[repr(packed(N))]

Fixes https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/33158
